Getting StartedÂ¶

Last Updated: May 27, 2014

The best way to learn how to use Tethys is to jump in and start developing an app. A tutorial is provided to demonstrate how to start a new Tethys App project and explain how to work with the SDK during development.

Outline:

  • Generate New App with Scaffold
    • Generate Scaffold
    • Development Installation
  • The Model and Persistent Stores
    • Register a Persistent Store
    • Create SQLAlchemy Model
    • Create an Initialization Script
    • Register Initialization Script
    • Reinstall App
    • Data Model Under Development
    • Enabling Persistent Store for Legacy Apps
  • The View and Templating
    • Templating
    • Add Map to Template
    • Add Table to Template
    • Snippets
    • Public Files and Resources
    • View Configuration
  • Working with the Controller
    • Query Persitent Store
    • Controller Tools Reference
  • URL Mapping
    • Create a New Contoller
    • Create a New Template
    • Map Controller to URL
    • URL Variables
  • Working with Form Data
    • Create Template with a Form
  • Configuring Apps
    • registerApp
    • registerControllers
    • registerTemplateDirectories
    • registerPublicDirectories
    • registerResources
    • registerPersistentStores
    • Example File
  • Distributing Apps
    • Setup Script
    • Production Installation
